title: Antonio Hernandez Rodriguez group portrait
creator: Idaho State Historical Society
description: Antonio Hernandez Rodriguez was instrumental in organizing committees in southern Idaho migrant labor camps to celebrate traditional Mexican fiestas and other cultural events. During the late 1950s, this Twin Falls committee of volunteers helped organize Mexican Independence Day festivities (photo #76-102.65/A courtesy Idaho State Historical Society).
subject: portraits;
source: Voces Hispanas: Hispanic Voices of Idaho - Excerpts from the Idaho Hispanic Oral History Project. Erasmo Gamboa, Idaho Commission on Hispanic Affairs, 1992.
